Posts.Content: I had breast cancer five years ago and have had a large cyst in that breast almost ever since.   Now I have severe itching in that breast.  Has anyone else ever had this happen?  Is it a cause to be concerned?  I would appreciate any information that I can can get .  Thank you ~~~
Posts.Title: Breast Itching five years after breast cancer

Posts.Content: Thank you for your reply.   I have appointments at the end of the month and I am hoping I get some answers... I also have a very large seroma in that breast.  They have drained fluid out of it several times....  As you say, all of this is a small price to pay for our life.....  I am mostly concerned about the redness of the surgery area and the warmness....
Posts.Title: Breast Itching five years after breast cancer

Posts.Content: I had very severe side effects from Arimedex... I took it less than three months and I could not get out of bed in the mornings, my hands were like claws, my feet hurt so bad that I had a hard time walking.  My bones all hurt so bad...  My doctor told me I was so wrong not to take it, but I had to quit or I would of been in a wheel chair... It was pure poison to me.  Now after several years, I have several autoimmune diseases and I was told that they could be from taking the arimidex.
Posts.Title: Side Effects of Arimidex After Almost 2 Years

Posts.Content: The lower part of my breast has been very red for three months.... It will clear up a little , just to be red and inflamed looking by the next day... It is very warm to the touch. The inflamed area is even a little below my breast.  It looks just like it did when I had radiation with my breast cancer in 2006.  I was burned from the radiation, and this is in the same area. I cannot get it to clear up.   My doctor said that it is a yeast infection, but nothing will clear it up...  Has anyone else ever had this happen?   I need help and I am not sure where to turn...  Please help me...
Posts.Title: Red Breast

Posts.Content: I took Arimidex for several I had breast cancer six years ago, I was not able to tolerate the Arimidex so my doctor put me on Tamoxifen....   I am also post menopause.  I took them both after I had breast cancer and the radiation...
Posts.Title: Arimidex versus Tamoxifen??

Posts.Content: I had breast cancer six years ago, followed with radiation.   This last few months my breast has been very red all around the surgery site.   My breast has been very warm, itches, burns, and sometimes is painful...  Has anyone else had this problem... I get so tired of going to doctors, going through all of the tests  and having all of these bills.   I am just hoping that cit is nothing.... I would like to hear from others that may of had this problem too.
Posts.Title: Hot Breast six years after breast cancer and radiation

Posts.Content: I have vert dense breasts and I was diagnosed with breast cancer.   They did several mammograms and sometimes they did MRI's and ultra sounds...  Ask your doctor lots of questions and ask if they should do more testing because of the dense tissue.
Posts.Title: Dense breast tissue

Posts.Content: Thank you for your response.  I do believe that all of my autoimmune  disorders have been caused from the radiation and Arimedex meds.  I had none of these problems until after the breast cancer ...
Posts.Title: Liver damage after having radiation for breast cancer

Posts.Content: I had breast cancer six years ago, and I had radiation.  I was burned so bad .   Now I have severe scarring on my liver.  The doctors will not admit that it was caused from the radiation, but my cancer was in the right breast and that your liver is located right behind the right breast.   I cannot believe that as bad as I was burned, that it did not also scar my liver.   I was told several years ago that my lungs were scarred from the radiation, so why couldn't my liver of been scarred too.  I have never drank, but trying to convince a doctor that my liver damage is not from drinking is impossible.  I am scheduled for liver biopsies in two weeks.   Has anyone else ever had this happen after having radiation as a followup for breast cancer?
Posts.Title: Liver damage after having radiation for breast cancer
Liver damage after having radiation for breast cancer

Posts.Content: I actually had 42 rounds of radiation.  I was burned like half way through.   I also had a mold made for me.  I did not have chemo, just surgery X2 and radiation.   Another lady that had her radiation at the same facility was also burned very bad.   It has been seven years and my skin in that area still has issues.   I still say that is why I have so much liver damage, but to get a doctor to say that will never happen.
Posts.Title: Liver damage after having radiation for breast cancer
Liver damage after having radiation for breast cancer

Posts.Content: I did get the results and they were inconclusive.   My RA Doc is sure that I have autoimmune hepatitis.  No one will say the scaring was cause by excesive radiation.   I have it five days a week for seven weeks and then the mega ones following for another week.
Posts.Title: Liver damage after having radiation for breast cancer

Posts.Content: Yes, i had blistering and bad burns all the way from my chest to my stomach.    My liver biopsy came back uncertain, but it is so scarred and I now have cirrious. I blame it all on the radiation burns. Yes, I had it five days a week.  The last seven were extra strong ones.   The sad is, I was dumb, I knew nothing about cancer, radiation or anything like this.  I would strongly recomend anyone going through cancer, to do a lot of research before making a final decision on your treatments.
Posts.Title: Liver damage after having radiation for breast cancer
